This keratoconus cause blur vision may require use rigid contact lens surgical intervention improve vision . One etiological factor keratoconus eye rubbing . Eye rub common subject eczema chronic allergic condition . It believe constant eye rub every minute year may lead permanent change corneal curvature lead formation keratoconus . It know previous study eye rub cause transient change shape clear window eye , change return baseline 5 minute follow 1 minute eye rub . Although clinician routinely advise subject refrain eye rub prescribe long term anti allergic medication , paucity scientific evidence .
